description:
Furuichi is called back from a resort on a tropical island where he was vacationing with his family to go to the public pool with Oga. At the pool, Furuichi runs into a nasty upperclassmen he knew from middle school, and it`s not just him, but Nene and the other Red Tails that are in trouble! Will Furuichi, "the strategist" finally make his move?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: You`re Not a Bad Specimen of a Man
なかなか男じゃないですか
